short_description.swe: Nyckelord för språkinlärning för unga och vuxna
short_description.eng: Keywords for Language Learning for Young and adults alike

description.swe:
Mer information om Kelly finns på projektsidan.

Other Kelly languages

  • Greek
  • Arabic, Chinese, English, Italian, Russian
  • Norwegian

If you use any of the Kelly list, please, cite the following reference:

Kilgarriff, Adam; Charalabopoulou, Frieda; Gavrilidou, Maria; Johannessen, Janne Bondi; Khalil, Saussan; Kokkinakis, Sofie Johansson; Lew, Robert; Sharoff, Serge; Vadlapudi, Ravikiran & Volodina, Elena. 2014. Corpus-based vocabulary lists for language learners for nine languages. Language Resources and Evaluation, 48:121–163, DOI 10.1007/s10579-013-9251-2.

{include https://svn.spraakdata.gu.se/sb-arkiv/pub/resurstext/Kelly-list_eng.txt} {include https://svn.spraakdata.gu.se/sb-arkiv/pub/resurstext/Kelly-resources_eng.txt}
description.eng:
More information about Kelly is available from the project page.

Other Kelly languages

Kilgarriff, Adam; Charalabopoulou, Frieda; Gavrilidou, Maria; Johannessen, Janne Bondi; Khalil, Saussan; Kokkinakis, Sofie Johansson; Lew, Robert; Sharoff, Serge; Vadlapudi, Ravikiran & Volodina, Elena. 2014.
